name: PhotoWorld
description:
PhotoWorld is a third-person visual game where the world is generated for the player. You can just run, study the map and take pictures of the species you like, which will be saved in the album and on your computer, or be a hunter for rare objects that sometimes appear on the way. The game has tasks for completing which you will receive achievements.
Drone is your assistant in this. This is your constant companion, with the help of which you can get into hard-to-reach places and take a wonderful picture.
There are several characters and their assistants to choose from, choose the best one!
The whole game is made in lowpoly, so it looks very calm and peaceful. With a light musical accompaniment, you can simply relax and immerse yourself in a wonderfully created world.
Good luck with your studies! :)
